product_name: L.A. GirlLightweight HD Pro Creamy Concealer
summary: SummaryCamouflage blemishes, correct color, or highlight & contour with L.A Girl Lightweight HD Pro Creamy Concealer. This lightweight formula provides buildable, long-wearing coverage.
details: DetailsFeaturesLightweight, creamy textureLong-wearing, crease-resistant formulaBuilt in, brush-tip applicatorCorrect, conceal, contour, & highlightItem 2505332How To UseChoose a color one or two shades lighter than your complexion. Apply to clean, makeup-free skin with a brush or fingertip for best results. Top with loose powder to set. Reapply if necessary. Try blending a couple of shades together for the perfect match. This multitasking concealer is perfect for contouring and highlighting.Precautions: If irritation occurs, discontinue use.IngredientsPorcelain: Water (Aqua), Cyclopentasiloxane, Beeswax (Cera Alba), Stearyl Dimethicone, Isododecane, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina), Cetyl PEG / PPG-10 / 1 Dimethicone Glyceryl Laurate, Polyglyceryl-4 Oleate, Mica, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Butylparaben, Propylparaben, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Propylene Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita Extract, Propylene Carbonate, Sodium Hyaluronate. May Contain: Iron Oxide (CI 77491), Iron Oxide (CI 77492), Iron Oxide (CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Choose a color one or two shades lighter than your complexion. Apply to clean, makeup-free skin with a brush or fingertip for best results. Top with loose powder to set. Reapply if necessary. Try blending a couple of shades together for the perfect match. This multitasking concealer is perfect for contouring and highlighting.Precautions: If irritation occurs, discontinue use.
ingredients: Cetyl PEG / PPG-10 / 1 Dimethicone Glyceryl Laurate
Sodium Hyaluronate. May Contain: Iron Oxide (

reviews.headline: It does its job, but is a little cakey
reviews.comments: It does it's job at color correction, but I feel like it is a little too thick and cakey under my eye and makes my wrinkles look more defined.

reviews.headline: Finally something that worked and was inexpensive!
reviews.comments: I have a few red spots on my cheeks that I could cover up but it was hard to blend the several products I tried and not have them show up. This was the magic product I needed and it only takes a small amount. This tube will last forever!! Thank you L.A. Girl!

reviews.headline: Not good coverage!
reviews.comments: Wish this covered better. Plus wish it didn't have parabens in it.

reviews.headline: love this concealer !
reviews.comments: this concealer is one of the first concealers ive used when i started makeup and i havent used another concealer since! i loveee this concealer it is buildable and has good coverage. its very lighweight and feels like theres nothing on my face. and for $5 ?? yes !!!

reviews.headline: As good as it gets
reviews.comments: I have fair, acne prone skin and get rosacea flare ups occasionally.  The mint green concealer is my go to for red areas.  The color isn't too green or green-yellow like many other brands.  Its also, light and I can top with my skin color concealer.  It blurs or hides the red well depending on how you blend and bake over it.  It's affordable too.  The applicator isnt great but, overall a good product.

reviews.headline: Not suitable for acne skin.
reviews.comments: I used this as a concealar not a color corrector, would leave patches and not blend and had no coverage, exsecive use of product is needed for it match ur shade

reviews.headline: Faithful
reviews.comments: Never misses a beat

reviews.headline: Gave me horrible breakout and impossible to blend
reviews.comments:
Every time I tried using this color-correcting concealer, I would get horrible acne breakout that I haven't experienced in years. It's like clockwork. 

Also, it comes out dry and gooey and impossible to blend well. It accentuates every wrinkle and line I have on my face, and I am relatively young and have combination-oily skin. I imagine this problem is even worse for those with drier or more mature skin.

reviews.headline: holy grail!!
reviews.comments: ive used this since i started wearing makeup, for the price it is amazing. It doesnt feel heavy at all and i even use it as foundation on more natural days. Only thing is that i would prefer a different applicator to be more hygenic.

reviews.headline: color not as pictured
reviews.comments: I ordered this based on reading so these great reviews, I tried the color match to my current concealer and went on their recommendation as it is also is what I picked before even trying the find my match. my color was the second to lightest color that they have, and when I received it, it is darker than my foundation. It is so dark it is so orange. So googling, colors watches and looking at them on people's arms. Everybody seems to have the same complaint that they come out very orange. The colors look absolutely nothing like the picture. I will be returning this and buying something different. That is very misleading and a waste of my time. Never, ever have I seen a color be so off the way that this is

reviews.headline: Color corrector
reviews.comments: Good product

reviews.headline: VERY full coverage
reviews.comments: I just wanted a cheap consealer that would cover eye bags and this is it. one thing i will say tho is that its a little oily and i vant stand that but i use powder over it and its just fine. its too light for me especially now that its summer but thats not the produxts fault.

reviews.headline: dark on skin
reviews.comments: bought the shade Procelain, looked LIGHT in picture ended up being DARK on my skin.

reviews.headline: Purple wipes out skin yellowing
reviews.comments: Covers well with a tiny amount. Erases the yellowing around my eyes. I didn't realize it was a brush tip applicator.

reviews.headline: cool pink is the best brightener shade
reviews.comments: I love the brush applicators on these. it's so easy to apply and the shade cool pink is the best brightener I've tried. its better than other brands and I've tried them all. it doesnt crease and brightens but isnt so stark that it's pasty or anything. it looks smooth and doesn't crease. I have very dark circles.

reviews.headline: Did not get what I asked for
reviews.comments: I wanted the yellow corrector and received the light yellow what sucks is the consistency basically water came out ðŸ˜’ I had hopes

reviews.headline: shows pores and textures
reviews.comments: i used this with different setting powders and sprays and different foubdations but it always still shows my pores and texture of my skin. i even used it with the patrick starr powder when cleans up all your mistakes with a flawless look and i could see my whole skin showing yhrough. i ised alot and it just is greasy and clings to any spots

Ive never color corrected before because it just seemed like too much of an extra strep but using the green color corrector on my red acne marks really did make them disappear once I put my foundation on. It isn't dry or make my skin patchy which is something I look for in concealers/foundations. I recommend you try if you are acne prone too, it did not break me out! I am thinking of getting the brighter pink one for my undereye next:)

reviews.headline: My Go-To
reviews.comments: I've been using this concealer as foundation on my lazy days for over 5 years. It's so easy to apply when I'm in a rush, I just brush a bit of it on my t-zone, then blend it out with a dense foundation brush and it gives me light to medium coverage in seconds. The only somewhat negative thing is that it isn't the best for oily skin but I'm okay with that because it's my life saver almost everyday since I'm always running late and need to slap my makeup on as quickly as possible. I do not think I could live without these cute lil squishy concealers. LA Girl really has our broke cheeks' backs hehe

reviews.headline: Conceals my dark spots
reviews.comments: Good quality and pigment to conceal my dark spots

faceoff_positive.comments: I've heard all the rage about this concealer from bloggers so I decided to give it a try and i'm so glad i did. Such great coverage and it goes on so effortlessly- you can even use it in the place of foundation.
faceoff_positive.headline: AMAZING product

faceoff_negative.comments: I give this two stars and not one only because I can tell where this would be good for oily skin. In my case though it clung to ALL of my dry places- even ones that aren't too bad. I tried this concealer in so many different ways but no matter what it didn't work. As soon as I put it on it made my skin look dry and was super patchy. As the day went on it started getting crapey under my eyes and my makeup just looked bad. This would be good for someone who wants light coverage and has oily skin. For someone who wants full coverage, this is not it. My other two complaints is that the lightest color beside the white one is still not light enough to highlight with and there is not much product in the tube, especially if you are going to highlight your whole face with it. Overall I can see where this could be good for some, but for me it was a disaster.
faceoff_negative.headline: NOT GOOD FOR DRY SKIN
